item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. SWE-Bench tainted by answer leakage; real pass rates significantly lower (252 points | 78 comments)
2. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (691 points | 557 comments)
3. Removing Jeff Bezos from my bed (366 points | 164 comments)
4. Yocto, RockPi and SBOMs: Building Modern Embedded Linux Images (40 points | 7 comments)
5. Richard Feynman's Blackboard at the Time of His Death (1988) (75 points | 46 comments)
6. The Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine (27 points | 3 comments)
7. Slime OS – An open-source app launcher for RP2040 based devices (10 points | discuss)
8. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (199 points | 93 comments)
9. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (48 points | 18 comments)
10. General Reasoning: Free, open resource for building large reasoning models (21 points | 5 comments)
11. DeepDive in everything of Llama3: revealing detailed insights and implementation (70 points | 3 comments)
12. Why Ruby on Rails still matters (135 points | 93 comments)
13. Johnny.Decimal – A system to organise your life (218 points | 144 comments)
14. Posh (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
15. Every .gov Domain (260 points | 211 comments)
16. Launch HN: Massdriver (YC W22) – Self-serve cloud infra without the red tape (33 points | 37 comments)
17. Cot: The Rust web framework for lazy developers (21 points | 5 comments)
18. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (105 points | 83 comments)
19. Train Your Own O1 Preview Model Within $450 (355 points | 55 comments)
20. Docker limits unauthenticated pulls to 10/HR/IP from Docker Hub, from March 1 (299 points | 342 comments)
21. The CRPG Renaissance, Part 3: TSR Is Dead (36 points | 17 comments)
22. NASA's James Webb Space Telescope faces potential 20% budget cut (79 points | 33 comments)
23. Show HN: Txeo – A Modern C++ Wrapper for TensorFlow (31 points | 6 comments)
24. Neo Gamma (Home Humanoid) (6 points | 5 comments)
25. Lithium-sulfur battery retains 80% charge capacity after 25,000 cycles (61 points | 33 comments)
26. All Is Unfinished: Henri Bergson's philosophy for our times (26 points | 5 comments)
27. The Profitable Startup (87 points | 28 comments)
28. Fly To Podman: a script that will help you to migrate from Docker (117 points | 68 comments)
29. Meta claims torrenting pirated books isn't illegal without proof of seeding (565 points | 380 comments)
30. Show HN: BadSeek – How to backdoor large language models (429 points | 86 comments)
